item.description:
Since Holacracy’s inception in 2004, it has evolved into one of the most intriguing models for taking organizations beyond both the top-down hierarchical structures of modernity and the pluralistic ideals of postmodernity. Drawing on elements of agile design, sociocracy, and Integral theory, Holacracy allows organizations to transcend the limits of ego and develop into effective, creative, and nimble organisms more powerful than the sum of their parts.

This talk, offered by TelosityOS, will:

  • Give you insight into the fundamental principles of Holacracy;
  • Offer tools and processes that can align any organization with its purpose and uplevel the way it goes about doing the work; and
  • Show how this evolutionary “operating system” can effectively maximize any organization’s creativity and effectiveness.

TelosityOS is a coaching and consulting company that works with organizations and individuals to assist them in manifesting their true purpose and teaches evolved practices for radically increased collaboration and communication. Wren Bernstein has a background as a life coach and psychotherapist; Rod Stanbrook and Uli Nagel are business owners and have held various types of management positions. All three are longtime students of Evolutionary Enlightenment and are certified Holacracy practitioners. They founded TelosityOS out of their passion for enlightened collaboration.
item.name: An Introduction to Holacracy: An Evolutionary Practice for Organizations
